ilex.htr.stk_U

stk_U(X, Y)[source]
Info:

Produces stokes U data

Parameters:

  • X (ndarray) – X polarisation data

  • Y (ndarray) – Y polarisation data

Returns:

Stokes data

Return type:

S (ndarray)
